amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax benefits for areas affected by Hurricanes Katrina, Rita, and Wilma and to extend certain expiring provisions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 2602 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2602 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 55. Record Vote Number: 330.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2602.

Amendment SA 2602 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S13072-13080) To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax benefits for areas affected by Hurricanes Katrina, Rita, and Wilma and to extend certain expiring provisions, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2602 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 55. Record Vote Number: 330.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2602 proposed by Senator Conrad.
